players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafia. We must vote him out today."
You: "That's a lie. I investigated Charlie and he's mafia. He's trying to frame me to save himself."
Diana: "Wait, you're both claiming to be detectives? That's impossible since there's only one detective in this game. One of you is definitely lying and must be the mafioso."
Charlie: "Diana is right, only one detective exists. I am the real detective and Bob is lying. Vote Bob to win."
You: "Charlie is lying. I am the real detective. He investigated me and is now trying to frame me. Vote Charlie to win."

Diana: "Since you both claim to be the detective and there's only one, the real detective needs to provide more convincing evidence. Charlie spoke first with his claim - Bob, if you're really the detective, when exactly did you investigate Charlie and what made you suspicious of him..."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafia. We must vote him out today."
Bob: "That's a lie. I investigated Charlie and he's mafia. He's trying to frame me to save himself."
Diana: "Wait, you're both claiming to be detectives? That's impossible since there's only one detective in this game. One of you is definitely lying and must be the mafioso."
You: "Diana is right, only one detective exists. I am the real detective and Bob is lying. Vote Bob to win."
Bob: "Charlie is lying. I am the real detective. He investigated me and is now trying to frame me. Vote Charlie to win."

Diana: "Since you both claim to be the detective and there's only one, the real detective needs to provide more convincing evidence. Charlie spoke first with his claim - Bob, if you're really the detective, when exactly did you investigate Charlie and what made you suspicious of him..."
